trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: The serpentfolk has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Innate Spellcasting
text: The serpentfolk of yig's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Multiattack
text: The serpentfolk makes two attacks. one with its bite and one with its scimitar.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) poison damage.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage.
